alert.note: Alert for Bent; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 3:50PM MDT until June 12 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PROWERS AND SOUTHEASTERN BENT COUNTIES... At 349 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles north of Two Buttes Reservoir, or 17 miles south of Lamar, moving northeast at 30 mph. The thunderstorm is still south of Lamar and the strong wind gusts are expected to reach Lamar by the end of the warning period. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lamar and Two Buttes Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with this storm will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
